pullRequest.title: AbstractIcon: Constant Standardization
pullRequest.bodyText:
This moves icons to use the AbstractIcon, Camouflage, and Portrait classes for related constants instead of IPlayer and Crew. I also reordered as required as a preventative measure against null values. Further, this implements a few minor changes as part of continuing to move towards using AbstractIcon to replace our current icon system.
To review: The first three commits are the changes for this branch, the four commit is a logging and formatting rework of ScenarioLoader.
The MekHQ-side of this is required for a merge.

commit.message: Moving to using AbstractIcon for constants
Modernizing ScenarioLoader's logging and fixing formatting issues

nodes.bodyText: Is there a difference between this second constructor and the first apart from the added parameters? (And, are they used somehow? Im getting old, I dont see it)
I suppose doing nothing is on purpose in getBaseImage. In that case the //TODO could be omitted.
